Title: Prohibits public funding to facilities using aversive interventions
Summary: Prohibits public funding to facilities or programs using aversive interventions on children; establishes a holistic autism spectrum disorder treatment center.
LawCode: Amd ยง483-d, Soc Serv L; add ยง13.44, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to prohibiting public funding to facilities using aversive interventions; and to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing a holistic autism spectrum disorder treatment center
